# Creating the JWS-SD
Contents of the JWS-SD:
```
{
    "iss": "https://example.com/issuer",
    "sub_jwk": {
        "kty": "RSA",
        "n": "ku56l41MBmMzlwDNtmSQRmzz4xGpVF9uQ3q3-n9vEMASXQ4RTE-s_dkNcnbiJyyuQhGzz2Qc30l8tALf9i1AfP9vAQ5GtMDHtNAPH5aLnM4VTTnArE6dNzes8IDVtX7rmUZ5yMz-0biYssIjB2nrLLOu-xu3o2a0q4sHeu74AA3GZPVG9Z-Sw1lbYHJHcLLOU5oVFmQ6_QYiUFx1MO_GFznbAMKUDIMf9df8UkfdpIfjPUNeiES8qqK7HVWgOC65qz94jGEtlp3vmcngs3Lp9bFtTgG3Ob99kNLF9q9IldJxCiIO-ySWxccjMo3ZFiRE81Y6V-qXQJcFVMaJrM20UQ",
        "e": "AQAB"
    },
    "iat": 1516239022,
    "exp": 1516247022,
    "sd_claims": {
        "given_name": "YrZOBbou/QAoIoSjSphvu1SHRtAsWdIGz6OF3rYvHvE=",
        "family_name": "0UjG2aT21dA/MZMrTzFCyo3MOn0ujCUCtNBaSaSmKck=",
        "email": "EOZHxrU3A2UZGJvZ2zPMl5iHdT6fUC2PNajgLUEA000=",
        "phone_number": "BJknGBHHqwMR/NG5Ip/dlswOcFm1EpzmFwi0ME+/JLg=",

        "birthdate": "IhzWKYfEhg5vI1pMMZR+ie1Bzkea4Ah1U6oGM+PzMAo="
    }
}
```

```

{
```

# Creating the JWS-SD-Proof
Contents of the JWS-SD-Proof:
```
{
    "nonce": 798143,
    "sd": {
        "family_name": "[\"YEjr4CwVuSDtmeAOF0nNKw==\", \"Doe\"]",
        "address": "[\"vw3Pg61KkF4i9ruZXNOIKQ==\", {\"street_address\": \"123 Main St\", \"locality\": \"Anytown\", \"region\": \"Anystate\", \"country\": \"US\"}]"
    }
}
```


The serialized JWS-SD-Proof:
```
eyJhbGciOiAiUlMyNTYifQ..tljVDKtScx8dTxTGu5OfVuyOjrh-aIxmcG0GrS_aDPk1H8OA9LDCDmR5rTriM5l29dqdxq3bChtemBNQXzq1RZG_UCHYrHqFKP_aW5IrOQgVM_IrauzATwikLUXOwtFrGtM_E0VqlCVNQdJYpOle0bIgs0DVGmlUH42epeRfVJTC2Q8it8kLiyL_r90AatwN2DtHAjcFUc-NZTCsMJpn9RwH80FvcYU4Q3u348oCyWHB2hssZ6b3PxUPzHzq88NhqsHL-NRNF2r-5MoCTQeLahZhd3EAQ3a4Cms11zR9JxuN1w5_WOp5YQzu03VGFgo4F_ErfRwFs8vAenxe_ONV7A
```


# Creating the Combined Representation
Combined Representation:
```
eyJhbGciOiAiUlMyNTYifQ..ipH0qqQznPuzD9iMJToYuvQrkgQ0phZEeqwtmZ17UnEeoRntMI1Q6lFEmHxptmHa4d4rmgbkVcsisXLYEnoHbzvrw9feIROaZ9gmGYFc-GDl5X1yu9Wn1AAetlpv_OIQj7-6RKFZyjAp1mzkvYT7WpmWyLMxKjdVgQgF0bPC9ggut7rty5TQoqQnvJDKIzmUZjO56UImqiziOyDxdQvTkpEHbYxRX9zeYgtSTjU4Ma2Awh_dvR4FOUnGSgiHC0Lvroxbkorl0dLWPqWBdw8M7OIXSrZFLcQq7i3drTZLBOFM9C6fg2PoIHqWAvMFYsHPFSnPSUG6WFoC16p5miYlVA.eyJhbGciOiAiUlMyNTYifQ..tljVDKtScx8dTxTGu5OfVuyOjrh-aIxmcG0GrS_aDPk1H8OA9LDCDmR5rTriM5l29dqdxq3bChtemBNQXzq1RZG_UCHYrHqFKP_aW5IrOQgVM_IrauzATwikLUXOwtFrGtM_E0VqlCVNQdJYpOle0bIgs0DVGmlUH42epeRfVJTC2Q8it8kLiyL_r90AatwN2DtHAjcFUc-NZTCsMJpn9RwH80FvcYU4Q3u348oCyWHB2hssZ6b3PxUPzHzq88NhqsHL-NRNF2r-5MoCTQeLahZhd3EAQ3a4Cms11zR9JxuN1w5_WOp5YQzu03VGFgo4F_ErfRwFs8vAenxe_ONV7A
```
